title: Creature names, help!
content:
I'm asking anyone to please help me out with naming a few creatures I'm working on!
I've got some graphics, and know what they will do, but I'm having a tough time coming up with "keenish" names for them.
For the sake of those who will want to be completely surprised by the creatures when they see the game, I'd rather keep the creature pictures and names secret for now, so please respond here to this topic and I'll send you a message to your ezInbox, or contact me one of these ways:
AIM: VitaminZach
email: zapdim8 [a t] juno [d o t] com

However, to get things started, I did post this creature over in Alex's creature competition:
E[img]http://keen.keenx.com/gfx/spitterweb.gif[/img]
He walks around until the player gets close enough, then he leans back on his tail and spits slime balls at the player. The slime balls fly the way a person throws a baseball - they launch up, but fall back to the ground.

I have 10 very unique (and I think you'll find pretty cool) creatures designed so far including the above.
9 have at least one frame sketches drawn.
7 have their behavior designed.
3 have a good amount of graphics ready.

Edit: I keep an eye on my ezInbox, so feel free to use that too!
